channel.title: Windows on River's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on River's Notes

item.title: PowerShell Run as Another User & Elevate the Process
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description: When you have UAC enabled, most of the time, the default PowerShell ISE is opened with normal process. This is not going to work when you want to apply the DSC resources. Have to have an administrative PowerShell process running to get it done.

item.title: Forgot Windows Local Admin Password? Let's Get it Reset or Create a New One!
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description: I don’t know how to Crack the current local admin password, but I know how to reset or become one. :)

item.title: NetBIOS Impacts Cluster Service
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description: As NetBIOS is a legacy technology and should be replaced by DNS in LAN, we are deciding to disable all NetBIOS on all NICs in our environment.

item.title: TFS Build Server Stops Working - Permission Issue
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description:
We got an issue for TFS build server today, it doesn’t build anything.

Symptoms

  • From Visual Studio, we cannot see any progress for the build.
  • From the build server, we cannot see any build being triggered, all agents status are “Ready”.
